explains: n. 托儿所，幼儿园；儿童房；<旧>儿童活动室；苗圃；（医院里的）育婴室；动物繁殖场；温床；两岁的马参加的赛马
wordGroup: nursery rhyme n. 童谣；儿歌
seedling nursery 苗圃；播种苗圃

sentences.en: Her youngest child is at nursery now.
sentences.cn: 她最小的孩子现在上托儿所。

sentences.en: The nursery is bright and cheerful, with plenty of toys.
sentences.cn: 该托儿所明亮宜人，有许多玩具。

sentences.en: One area of contention is the availability of nursery care.
sentences.cn: 争论的一个方面是提供幼儿保育的可能性。
